ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-ima | |- ( ( A u. B ) " C ) = ran ( ( A u. B ) |` C ) |
| 2 |  | #P_resundir | |- ( ( A u. B ) |` C ) = ( ( A |` C ) u. ( B |` C ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_rneqi | |- ran ( ( A u. B ) |` C ) = ran ( ( A |` C ) u. ( B |` C ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_rnun | |- ran ( ( A |` C ) u. ( B |` C ) ) = ( ran ( A |` C ) u. ran ( B |` C ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 3, 4 | #P_3eqtri | |- ( ( A u. B ) " C ) = ( ran ( A |` C ) u. ran ( B |` C ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_df-ima | |- ( A " C ) = ran ( A |` C ) |
| 7 |  | #P_df-ima | |- ( B " C ) = ran ( B |` C ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_uneq12i | |- ( ( A " C ) u. ( B " C ) ) = ( ran ( A |` C ) u. ran ( B |` C ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_eqtr4i | |- ( ( A u. B ) " C ) = ( ( A " C ) u. ( B " C ) ) |
